root.name: Rogue Trip: Vacation 2012
root.description: OverviewSimilar to the Twisted Metal series (from the developers of Twisted Metal 1 2), Rogue Trip: Vacation 2012 features vehicular combat in a variety of future tourist attractions. In Rogue Trip, you choose between 16 different vehicles in which to fight for control of "The Tourist", who in turn gives you money for however long you are in control of him/her. The Vehicles vary, from a UFO to a hot dog car, each with their own special weapons.CharactersVehicle: Meat WagonDriver: Richard "Dick" BiggsSpecial: Weenie WhackerTop Speed - 6Handling - 7Armor - 6Mass - 8Vehicle: Destroying AngelDriver: Sister Mary LasiviousSpecial: Touched by an AngelTop Speed - 5Handling - 6Armor - 7Mass - 10Vehicle: PyroDriver: NecrobotSpecial: Vapor CloudTop Speed - 4Handling - 5Armor - 8Mass - 8Vehicle: BiohazardDriver: Agent OrangeSpecial: Zoomy RocketsTop Speed - 4Handling - 5Armor - 10Mass - 10Vehicle: IntruderDriver: RatmanSpecial: The RipperTop Speed - 8Handling - 7Armor - 7Mass - 6Vehicle: OzoneDriver: Shiz O' ManicSpecial: Shock TreatmentTop Speed - 6Handling - 6Armor - 6Mass - 7Vehicle: Bitchin' WheelsDriver: BunnySpecial: Poodle PowerTop Speed - 8Handling - 7Armor - 6Mass - 5Vehicle: Rock N' RuleDriver: Elvis D.
